text: Edifício Copan is a skyscraper in São Paulo, Brazil. It is 140 meters (460 feet) tall and has 38 floors. It was built in 1966. The building was designed by Oscar Niemeyer. ==Related pages== * Downtown São Paulo * Mirante do Vale * Edifício Itália * Edifício Altino Arantes Category:Buildings and structures in São Paulo Category:Skyscrapers in Brazil Category:1966 establishments in South America Category:1960s establishments in Brazil
title: Edifício Copan
